meanings.definition: A person who tells or narrates something.
meanings.sent1: The relaters at the library shared exciting stories with the children.
meanings.sent2: The relaters in the book club discussed their favorite novels.
meanings.sent3: The relaters at the party had everyone laughing with their funny anecdotes.
meanings.sent4: The relaters in the documentary painted a vivid picture of the historical events.
meanings.sent5: The relaters in the play brought the characters to life with their storytelling.

meanings.definition: A person who is connected by blood or marriage.
meanings.sent1: The relaters at the family reunion reminisced about old times.
meanings.sent2: The relaters in the genealogy project traced their ancestry back centuries.
meanings.sent3: The relaters at the wedding shared heartfelt stories about the couple.
meanings.sent4: The relaters in the family tree connected branches from different generations.
meanings.sent5: The relaters in the photo album captured moments of joy and love.
